title: IESCO ensures uninterrupted electricity supply during sehri, iftar times
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 11 (APP): The Islamabad Electric Supply Company (IESCO) has announced its commitment to ensuring uninterrupted electricity supply during Sehri and Iftar times.
According to a spokesperson of IESCO, monitoring rooms have been set up in Islamabad and all operational circles.
Continuous monitoring of electricity transmission has been initiated at grid stations and 11kV feeders for 24 hours. Field formations have been provided with additional materials to promptly address complaints.
Complaints can be lodged through complaint office numbers or the helpline 118.
Muhammad Islam Khan, Chief Engineer Operations, has been appointed as the focal person to oversee all activities.
During the holy month of Ramazan, efforts are being made to ensure uninterrupted electricity supply and prompt resolution of complaints.‚Äù
